name: Moxxin
content: Moxxin was a human child who lived in Cloud City and was friends with Traff and Vanraya. The three children stole the Cantonarive crown coin from Baron Administrator Lando Calrissian and hoped to give it to the crime boss Wonn Ionstrike in exchange for a reward. Calrissian informed the children that he intended to use the coin as payment to a grand slicer who would protect Cloud City from the Galactic Empire, and they decided not to give it to Ionstrike, returning it to Calrissian.
